评论概述: One of the cutest dresses I own
评论详情: Absolutely love love love this dress. I got a 2x & it runs true to size. The straps stay on great & the bust area gives the illusion my breasts are a little bigger than a B cup. The material is thick & durable, doesn't feel cheap at all, & gas enough flow that I can breathe & stay cool as I'm in the desert. I have washed & dried and noticed it doesn't wrinkle like cotton. There is a slip underneath which is great. I wear this at least once a week. I wish it had pockets for my phone & keys. It's very flattering & I get compliments every time I wear it.

评论概述: One is perfect and Another one is too big..
评论详情: I first bought the white and blue dress by Bell Poque, and I LOVED it! The style, the length, the colors and patterns, everything was fantastic.  So when I got a notification about their another dress had a deal, I immediately placed an order. I got the blue-yellow floral this time because I thought the combination of those colors is so unique and fun. When I tried it on, the fit felt different, especially the chest area. It felt bigger and I didn’t feel comfortable bending over to pick up something in it.  So I compared it with my first dress, and it turned out that the chest area for this blue-yellow dress was about 2” bigger, as you can see in my photos. Ugh… I’m not sure why the same size differs this much, but I was absolutely heartbroken because I LOVE the dress! But it’s going to cost about the same to take it to the alterations, so I returned the second dress. I'm super disappointed.  By the way, I’m 5/6” and about 160 lb, usually wear XL for most of the clothes, including dresses like those. The first one fits me perfectly, but not the second one. Oh, my bra size is 38C if that helps.  The first white dress - 10 stars! This (second) blue-yellow dress - 2 stars...

The dress has an adjustable feature on the straps, which is very helpful. The fabric is cute and the style looks retro. I paired the dress with a shrug, crinoline, and wide belt, but it is also cute without them. There  is a section in the back of the dress that stretches, which makes it more comfortable and more accommodating in the way it fits.

I was looking for a cute dress to wear to BBQs and other casual events and this one caught my eye. I have a small bust and was worried that it might not fit, but I'm glad I took the chance. It fits like a glove and looks incredible. I am 5'4" and 120 lbs. I got size small. The fabric feels a little more synthetic than I would like, but it came out of the bag without a single wrinkle AND has a built in slip and lining. So, I can overlook the synthetic feel of the fabric. This was well worth the money. I will be buying more from this company in rhe future.
The vintage strawberry dress was made very well, colors were perfect not to bright or to dull, the fabric had just the right weight material not to heavy, and the price was very reasonable.
